articles.author: Murali Krishnan
articles.title: India: Could Maha Kumbh Mela stampede have been prevented? - DW (English)
articles.description: After a crowd crush killed dozens of people at the world's largest religious gathering, questions have been raised about security and crowd control at massive events in India.
articles.content: At least 40 people were killed, and hundreds more injured, in the early hours of Wednesday when a stampede broke out at Maha Kumbh Mela, the world's largest religious festival that attracts millions … [+5316 chars]
